item.title: Home Agency
item.dc:creator: kleoadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row inner_container="no" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" border="none"][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="agency-home"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_color="#ffffff" type="image" bg_color="#34495e" bg_position_horizontal="center" padding_top="100px" padding_bottom="100px" border="none" el_class="ov-hidden" bg_image="932"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text animation="animate-when-visible" css_animation="bottom-to-top"]

I'm a headline about this section

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][kleo_gap][vc_column_text]We are a fairly small, flexible design studio that designs for print and web. We work flexibly with clients to fulfill their design needs. Whether you need to create a brand completely from scratch or are looking for a design refresh, we are confident that you and your team will be satisfied with the results.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]We are a fairly small, flexible design studio that designs for print and web.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Get more features. Get more done.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes"]KLEO offers more useful features than any other wordpress theme. So you can do more to customize the experience.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="40px"][kleo_divider type="long" text="Some of KLEO Feature Highlights"][kleo_gap size="40px"][kleo_grid type="4" animation="yes" colored_icons="yes"][kleo_feature_item title="Membership Ready" icon="shield"]Create Membership Levels and easily restrict content based on member access[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Facebook Login/Register integration" icon="facebook"]Easily register or login with you Facebook account. Everything you need is included, just enable the feature from Admin panel[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Live Notifications" icon="megaphone-1"]Easily add live notofications to your menu and set the auto-refresh time from admin panel.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Unique Design" icon="html5"]Buddypress & bbPress have never enjoyed such great attention to detail. Modern and clean design.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Extremely Flexible" icon="popup"]You no longer need to be a professional developer or designer to create an awesome website. Let your imagination run wild and create the site of your dreams. KLEO has all the tools to get you started.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Drag & Drop Page Builder" icon="equalizer"]No coding required in building a professional website. Included as a plugin, K Elements provide unique elements to create awesome pages.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Free Updates" icon="dropbox"]Many great features are yet to come to this theme so be the first to know about.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Outstanding Support" icon="umbrella"]Join our happy community, get help and start learning new things. Also we’re constantly improving and adding new features. You get all the new versions for FREE life-time.[/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][kleo_testimonials type="carousel" number="6"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" type="color" padding_top="80" border="none"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Some of our work

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We are a fairly small, flexible design studio that designs for print and web. We work flexibly with clients to fulfill their design needs. Whether you need to create a brand completely from scratch or are looking for a design refresh, we are confident that you and your team will be satisfied with the results.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" border="none"][vc_column][vc_images_carousel images="869,870,871,872,873,874,101,832,93,878,877,876" img_size="300x300" hide_pagination_control="yes" animation="animate-when-visible" min_items="2" max_items="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row front_status="draft" text_align="center" text_color="#ffffff" type="color" bg_color="#ffcd3b"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Fun Facts

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]

[kleo_animate_numbers animation="animate-when-almost-visible" timer="3000"]2[/kleo_animate_numbers].[kleo_animate_numbers animation="animate-when-almost-visible" timer="3000"]247[/kleo_animate_numbers]

MEMBERS ONLINE

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]

[kleo_animate_numbers animation="animate-when-almost-visible" timer="3000"]362[/kleo_animate_numbers]

GROUPS OF INTERESTS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]

[kleo_animate_numbers animation="animate-when-almost-visible" timer="3000"]43[/kleo_animate_numbers].[kleo_animate_numbers animation="animate-when-almost-visible" timer="3000"]815[/kleo_animate_numbers]

TOPICS CREATED

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="20px"][kleo_divider text="Join us today and share the same experience with the most happiest users worldwide"][kleo_gap size="20px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="20px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" section_type="alternate" padding_top="80" border="none"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We are continually working on improving KLEO

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="32px"][vc_column_text]We are a fairly small, flexible design studio that designs for print and web. We work flexibly with clients to fulfill their design needs. Whether you need to create a brand completely from scratch or are looking for a design refresh, we are confident that you and your team will be satisfied with the results.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_posts_grid][kleo_gap size="30px"][kleo_button title="View archive" href="#" size="lg" icon="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row front_status="draft"][vc_column][kleo_grid type="4" animation="yes" bordered_icons="yes"][kleo_feature_item title="IOS" icon="apple" icon_size="big" icon_position="center"][/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="IOS" icon="apple" icon_size="big" icon_position="center"][/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="IOS" icon="apple" icon_size="big" icon_position="center"][/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="IOS" icon="apple" icon_size="big" icon_position="center"][/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row front_status="draft" text_align="center" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

About us

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes"]It is our mission to be the most trusted and influential leader in the industry. We will provide our customers unparalleled "no-excuses" services anywhere in the world where they may operate. Our core values:[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_tabs type="pills" align="centered"][vc_tab title="The Team" tab_id="1408539342-1-86"][/vc_tab][vc_tab title="Our History" tab_id="1408539342-2-0"][/vc_tab][/vc_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="image" bg_position="center" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_cover="false" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" border="none" bg_image="75"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

About us

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]It is our mission to be the most trusted and influential leader in the industry. We will provide our customers unparalleled "no-excuses" services anywhere in the world where they may operate.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_column_text]

Our core values:

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="20px"][kleo_list align="center"][kleo_list_item icon="ok"]Take on Challenges[/kleo_list_item][kleo_list_item icon="ok"]Be Honorable[/kleo_list_item][kleo_list_item icon="ok"]Have Fun[/kleo_list_item][kleo_list_item icon="ok"]Our People[/kleo_list_item][kleo_list_item icon="ok"]Do Whatever it Takes[/kleo_list_item][/kleo_list][kleo_grid type="2"][/kleo_grid][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Latest news

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Cras dapibus. Vivamus elementum semper nisi. Aenean vulputate eleifend tellutts. Nullam dictum felis.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_wp_posts title="// 2014" number="4" show_date="1"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="100px"][kleo_divider text="You’ll be informed about updates, special offers and planned changes to KLEO."][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_column_text][mc4wp_form id="1149"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row front_status="draft" text_align="center" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" border="none"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

IN CASE YOU NEED HELP

[/vc_column_text][kleo_grid type="3" animation="yes" style="box"][kleo_feature_item title="Presales Question?" icon="help" icon_position="center"]This theme comes with an extensive help file that explains how to set up every aspect of the theme, however, we’ll be happy to help you if you need technical support or have any question. Dont hesitate to contact us via our support forum.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Need Support?" icon="graduation-cap" icon_position="center"]This theme comes with an extensive help file that explains how to set up every aspect of the theme, however, we’ll be happy to help you if you need technical support or have any question. Dont hesitate to contact us via our support forum.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Check Forum" icon="chat" icon_position="center"]This theme comes with an extensive help file that explains how to set up every aspect of the theme, however, we’ll be happy to help you if you need technical support or have any question. Dont hesitate to contact us via our support forum.[/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" text_color="#b2b8c0" type="color" bg_color="#263242" padding_top="100" border="none"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

KLEO // Next level WordPress Theme

item.title: Careers - Agency
item.dc:creator: kleoadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row inner_container="no" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.2" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" bg_color="#f8f8f8" enable_parallax="false"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="agency-careers"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="60" padding_bottom="60" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_color="#ffffff" type="color" bg_color="#1abc9c"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Be part of something cool

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left" lead="yes"]KLEO develops fully customizable Wordpress Multi-Purpose themes to fit any demanding needs. We’re building a global platform that already powers thousands of businesses around the world. If you want to contribute, come and join us![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="0" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_tabs type="pills" style="square" active_tab="3" align="centered"][vc_tab title="Our Values" tab_id="1392158619-2-76"][/vc_tab][vc_tab title="What We Offer" tab_id="1392158729389-2-10"][/vc_tab][vc_tab title="Job Oportunities" tab_id="1392158730638-3-10" icon="star-empty"][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_accordion icons_position="to-left"][vc_accordion_tab title="01. Media Relations Specialist - Position OPEN" icon="minus-1" icon_closed="plus-1" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Our company is looking for an energic, detail-oriented person to be a media relations specialist at its KLEO office.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
Responsibilities
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
Experience Required
  • 1 to 2 years experience in public relations.
  • Completed undergraduate coursework in journalism, marketing communications or business.
  • Superb writing skills.
  • Ability to communicate effectively and work in a team environment.
  • Strong ability to prioritize and multi-task.
  • Positive attitude in a deadline-oriented environment.
How to Apply
Please send a cover letter and resume to hr@your-domain.com. Please put 2013 Media Relations Specialist in the subject line.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="02. Web Designer - Position OPEN" icon="minus-1" icon_closed="plus-1" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="03. Web Marketing Internship - Position OPEN" icon="minus-1" icon_closed="plus-1" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="04. SEO Internship - Position CLOSED" icon="minus-1" icon_closed="plus-1" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_tab][/vc_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Whant to join us?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]If you're a successful professional who's looking for a more sensible commute.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="CONTACT US" target="_self" style="highlight" size="lg" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Services - Agency
item.dc:creator: kleoadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row inner_container="no" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.2" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" bg_color="#f8f8f8" enable_parallax="false"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="agency-services"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="60" padding_bottom="60" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left" text_color="#ffffff" type="color" bg_color="#ee5972"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

A large part of our work solves our clients’ challenges through our professional services.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row front_status="draft" inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="40" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left" lead="yes"]KLEO develops fully customizable Wordpress Multi-Purpose themes to fit any demanding needs. We’re building a global platform that already powers thousands of businesses around the world. If you want to contribute, come and join us![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]SQ are granted the 'Elite Author' badge for their established reputation, overall quality, commitment to the market and the milestones they've hit in Envato Marketplaces where their products are currently being sold. Looking at the way we have come so far, we spotted some interesting numbers which might be worth a mention:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="40" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="1118" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="el-appear" img_size="large"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Strategy Solutions

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="1117" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="el-appear" img_size="large"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Marketing & Research
